2.label: Getting Of The Island.
2.desc: On a workbench in the basement.

4.label: Escaping Islanders
4.desc: On a shelf on the same floor as the lower roof.

5.label: Harass The Huns!
5.desc: On a table in the shack's basement. Crawl under a table to reach the ladder. Collecting this unlocks @link[primary.2.3|Option C - Sabotage the generator].

1.label: Grin And Bear It!
1.desc: Inside the safe in the building. The room can be accessed by climbing some vines outside the building. The safe can be opened with the @link[code.1] or a satchel charge.

2.label: Cut Costs Cost Lives
2.desc: On a desk in officer Fisher's office.

3.label: Oafish Officers
3.desc: On a table in the underground hospital.

4.label: Transport Troubles
4.desc: On a desk in the underground hospital.

5.label: Drastic Measures
5.desc: On a wooden table on the ground floor.

1.label: TODT Uniform Badge
1.desc: On a table in the shack.

2.label: Crystal Radio
2.desc: On a workbench in the basement.

3.label: Comfort Bag
3.desc: On top of a dresser on the upper floor.

2.label: Stone Eagle
2.desc: On the roof of the Dollmann observation tower.

3.label: Stone Eagle
3.desc: On top of a pillar protruding from the facade.

1.label: Rifle Workbench
1.desc: In the church tower. Climb the vines on the southern side to enter.

2.label: SMG Workbench
2.desc: In the shack's basement. Crawl under a table to reach the ladder.

desc.1: Option A - Overload the pressure valves (0/2).
desc.2: Option A - Open the engine room vents.
desc.3: Option A - Drop satchel charge down vents.
desc.4: Option B - Radio in the scuttle code.
desc.5: Option C - Set up a chain reaction (0/2).
desc.6: Option C - Set off the chain reaction.

desc.1: Option A - Sabotage the artillery shell.
desc.2: Option B - Find the scuttle code.
Option B - Disable the radio equipment.

2.label: Stop the Construction of the Second Mirus Gun

1.label: Countryside House
1.desc: Climb the vines on the back of the building to unlock an alternate mission start.

3.label: Roadside House
3.desc: Climb the vines on the back of the building to unlock an alternate mission start.

4.label: Martello Tower
4.desc: Germans are storing medical supplies in a Martello tower on the coast.

5.label: Mirus Munitions Bunker
5.desc: Germans are storing explosives supplies in a bunker to the north.

7.label: Tank Depot
7.desc: Supplies are being sent from the hospital to the nearby tank depot.

1.label: Hommet Safe Combination
1.desc: On a wooden table in the building.

3.label: Half of the Mirus Scuttle Code
3.desc: Inside a safe in the office. The safe can be opened with the @link[code.2] or a satchel charge.

5.label: Submarine Pen Scuttle Code
5.desc: Inside a safe in the office. The safe can be opened with the @link[code.4] or a satchel charge.
